{# Logo link generation -#} {% if not theme_logo.get("link") %} {% set href = pathto(root_doc) %} {% elif hasdoc(theme_logo.get("link")) %} {% set href = pathto(theme_logo.get("link")) %} {# internal page #} {% else %} {% set href = theme_logo.get("link") %} {# external url #} {% endif %} {#- Logo HTML and image #} {# get all the brand information from html_theme_option #} {% set is_logo = "light" in theme_logo["image_relative"] %} {% set alt = theme_logo.get("alt_text", "Logo image") %} {% if is_logo %} {# Theme switching is only available when JavaScript is enabled. # Thus we should add the extra image using JavaScript, defaulting # depending on the value of default_mode; and light if unset. #} {% if default_mode is undefined or default_mode == "auto" %} {% set default_mode = "light" %} {% endif %} {% set js_mode = "light" if default_mode == "dark" else "dark" %} {% endif %} {% if not is_logo or theme_logo.get("text") %}

{{ theme_logo.get("text") or docstitle }}

{% endif %}
